body.name: 2-Tier Stackable Shoe Rack, Wooden 2-Shelf Shoe Organizer Freestanding Shoe Storage Stand for 6-9 Pairs, Perfect for Closet, Entryway, Office Use - White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 33 mins
features: 🔥Get Organized - Feel tired of messy shoes in your closet? Not anymore! You should have been in comfort and joy when getting into your “Area”. Simply categorize your messy shoes based on type, season or frequency of use, have them accommodated to LOWOSA stackable 2-shelf storage racks. Feel at ease to reach the pair you need and be ready to go!

🔥Build a Shoe Storage System - The innovative stackable design of the shoe rack makes it efficient and effortless for you to build a perfect shoe storage system in your closet. It allows you to maximize the vertical space through adjusting the number of tiers based on practical needs, which is an excellent choice for areas with limited storage space

🔥Customize the Size of the System - Each single unit comes with 4 extra wooden dowels, which are meant to fit and support another upper shelf. Feel free to place shelves horizontally or vertically add the number of tiers for expanding the storage space based on your personal storage needs

🔥Modern Accent - It comes with modern style white finish on the surface, superior smooth and elegant. Comparing to those plastic, non-woven fabric material shoe storage stands, this 2-shelf shoe rack is born to last long as well being as an added nice decoration in your home

🔥Not limited to Shoe Storage Alone - With the compact design and its perfect size of 24”x12”x12”, it allows you to place the shelves at different places in home as it serves a variety of purposes such as organizing shoes, storing bathroom essentials, collecting your trading cards, and placing office supplies...

🔥Premium Self-Tapping Screws - Afraid of wobbly stacking racks due to its simple construction? Not a chance! With 1.6 inches long, premium quality self-tapping screws connecting all panels, these stackable shoe shelves are way more stable than expected

🔥10 Minutes Assembly - Thanks to the concise structure and detailed instruction, this LOWOSA shoe rack organizer can be put together in 10 minutes on your own, even faster! Plus, once there were any product issues after the purchase, feel free to reach out to Amazon customer service for a replacement or money-back

⚠️WARNING: Beware! To avoid the board from unexpected cracks or damage during assembly, you should always use the Allen wrench included to carefully secure all boards instead of using an electric screwdriver

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LOWOSA 2-Tier Stackable Shoe Rack, Wooden 2-Shelf Shoe Organizer Freestanding Shoe Storage Stand for 6-9 Pairs, Perfect for Closet, Entryway, Office Use - White Do you get bored with those cheaply made plastic and non-woven fiber stackable shoe racks that are always fast aging even falling apart...? You must wish to put some real stackable shoe shelves that are nice, reliable, and practical in your closet. Go down and see which features you are fond of about our stackable shelves: Space-Saving - It allows you to maximize vertical space, making them an excellent option for small living spaces or areas with limited storage Customizable - You can adjust or reduce the number of tiers based on your practical needs. The flexibility of the stacking feature allows it to easily collect varying quantities and different types of footwear. Accessibility - It helps you easily access your shoes without having to rummage through piles or boxes. It’s a mush have for those who have a large collection of footwear or frequently rotate shoes based on the season or occasion Portability - They are lightweight and portable, you can feel free to move them to different areas in your house or even put them in your truck when moving to a new place LOWOSA Stackable Shoe Racks - Not limited to shoe storage alone, but also a a practical solution of maintaining a neat and clutter-free environment for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The shoe rack arrived with clear instructions and was quick to assemble. It's sturdy, weighing approximately 10 pounds, and can serve as either a shoe rack or a desktop shelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shoe rack came with excellent instructions.It did say it would take 2 people 45 minutes to assemble but my teenage son did it himself in 15.Very easy.It holds 6 pair of my sons shoes.Good quality, it is not shaky.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just a little bit off- does not sit evenly.
reviews.reviewText: A single unit arrives with two tiers - middle shelf and top of unit. Easy to assemble but once assembled, it did not sit evenly and rocks slightly.Size 12 men's shoes can fit two pair on shelf and on top of unit. I placed this entire organizer on the shelf in closet and can also fit two pair of shoes on the bottom for a total of six pair neatly organized, easy to see and easy to reach.Price point is a bit high for a single organizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful storage option
reviews.reviewText: Used this in my closet to create more space for my shoes. Works great and was easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great storage solution
reviews.reviewText: This was super easy to assembly and fits great in my closet. It takes advantage of the wasted vertical space, and now I can fit more shoes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shoe rack in five minutes
reviews.reviewText: This show is well-made and easy to assemble. The word is plenty sturdy to hold shoes, the paint job is well done, the hardware is strong and stable.Assembly took only a handful of minutes. Just needed a Phillips screwdriver. All the parts were there, plus some extras (which I always appreciate even when I don’t need them.) The holes were nicely drilled and everything went together easily.I installed the boards upside down from what they show in their picture so the cam bolts are on the bottom and won’t show. They provided white covering dots which I went ahead and used anyway.The shoes in the picture are a men’s 11 and a women’s 6 for sizing.This should last a good long time as long as no one steps on it. Any guesses why we needed a new one in the first place?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This shelf really helped me maximize my closet space. Setup was very quick and simple, with easy to follow instructions. The finished product is very sturdy and could easily be used to hold a variety of household items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A nice shelf for inside your closet. I use it for more then just shoes. Easy to put together.
